text:
March 7, 1957
TOs NAEB BOARD OF DIRECTORS
FROM: Burton Paulu
The NAEB Board of Directors will meet in the Deshler-Hilton
Hotel in Columbus at 8:00 p.m. on the evening of Monday, May 6Â®
There also will be morning, afternoon and evening sessions on
May 7* I hope you can all be present at all sessions.
The Institute itself will begin on the morning of May 8.
There will be an NAEB-sponsored utilization session on the afternoon
of Wednesday the 8th, and an NAEB luncheon on the afternoon of
Thursday the 9th. There will also be a meeting of the NAEB
Organizational Committee at a time not yet determined on the 9th
or 10tho
